post.author: 김성욱
post.content: Ref: Here Company URL: https://www.fidelity.com/ Programmer Analyst, Sr - Internet Development – 0407902 Job Description Description Reporting the Manager, Development –Internet, the Senior Programmer Analyst will develop, deploy and support high quality applications in a complex internet and intranet environment. Also acts as technical leader on smaller projects. Develops, documents and implements new applications and technologies. Assists the technical leader to determine project scope and cost estimates Shares knowledge of new technologies with other members of the group. Finds new and creative ways to use technologies to meet business needs. Optionally function in systems or technical analyst capacity, or leadership capacity from time to time Assists in the development of Programmer Analysts through training, coaching, mentoring Ensures adherence to internal Fidelity and industry standards (i.e. secure code review process) Assists business professional to produce user documentation. Acts as a technical leader in small projects. Qualifications University (or College) degree in computer science, engineering or equivalent experience/education 3 – 5 years experience in Internet technology related programming environments 1 – 2 years of experience with WebSphere 4.x or 5.x development and deployment environment. 2 -3 years of experience with Java (JSP, Beans/Class, EJB, WSAD, etc.), PL/SQL 1 -2 years of XML/XSLT experience Unix experience (AIX, Solaris) Good knowledge of Security (Networking, PKI, firewalls, etc) Knowledge of wireless technology Job Profile Job Field Web Development Locations ON-Toronto Organization Canada Schedule Full-time Job Level Individual Contributor Education Level Bachelor's Degree (±16 years) Job Type Standard Shift Day Job Overtime Status Exempt Travel No
post.title: Programmer Analyst, Sr - Internet Development
